publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2742.1 Phil Gallie: M77 Extension—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2742) in the name of Margaret Jamieson, insert at end "but albeit regrets the four lost years of inactivity that delayed the start of the extension and which followed the election of the Labour Government in 1997." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-2742.1 Phil Gallie: M77 Extension—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2742) in the name of Margaret Jamieson, insert at end "but albeit regrets the four lost years of inactivity that delayed the start of the extension and which followed the election of the Labour Government in 1997."
